buff.name: Buff
buff.description: Temporarily doubles damage for 30s. One time use.

coffee.name: Coffee
coffee.description: Temporarily boosts shooting speed for 30s. One time use.

emp.name: EMP
emp.description: Shocks everything within a 3x3 square area. One time use.

grenade.name: Grenade
grenade.description: Destroys everything within a 3x3 square area. One time use.

nuke.name: Nuke
nuke.description: Wipes the grid of all active enemies. One time use.

shield.name: Shield
shield.description: Provides placed defences with temporary invincibility for 15s. One time use.

charmHack.name: Charm Hack
charmHack.description: Hacks an enemy robot, turning it to your side. One time use.

scrapper.name: Scrapper
scrapper.description: All scrap metal recovered from destroyed enemies doubles for 30s. One time use.

conscriptionOrder.name: Conscription Order
conscriptionOrder.description: The next human placed is placed for free. One time use.

doomHack.name: Doom Hack
doomHack.description: Hacks an enemy robot, destroying it. One time use.
